text: Ever consider old pandemics shaping current cityscape? Totally ghostly too.
Found out our oldest hospital was once a colonial fortress!
Forgotten tales everywhere, especially in neglected spots!
"Hitting milestones doesn't stop surprises - adaptability over plans."
Life’s impromptu; even plans need edits sometimes!
Definitely catch myself diagnosing random folks!
Psychic consultations might seem less wacky if you consider that uncertainty can really get under our skin - even impacts health! People sometimes prefer hope over dividends.

Sexism in medicine? Tell me bout' it! Sometimes breaking stereotypes feels like part-time work besides saving lives. Keeping steady despite eyerolls though — dedication speaks volumes over dated notions!
